rows.title: commandButton/commandLink/ajax action/listener method not invoked or input value not set/updated

117:
<p>Got stuck with this issue myself and found one more cause for this problem.
If you don't have setter methods in your backing bean for the properties used in your *.xhtml , then the action is simply not invoked.</p>

<p>I had lots of fun debugging an issue where a <code>&lt;h:commandLink&gt;</code>'s action in <code>richfaces</code> <code>datatable</code> refused to fire. The table used to work at some point but stopped for no apparent reason. I left no stone unturned, only to find out that my <code>rich:datatable</code> was using the wrong <code>rowKeyConverter</code> which returned nulls that richfaces happily used as row keys. This prevented my <code>&lt;h:commandLink&gt;</code> action from getting called.</p>

<p>One more possibility: if the symptom is that the first invocation works, but subsequent ones do not, you may be using PrimeFaces 3.x with JSF 2.2, as detailed here: <a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15897201/no-viewstate-is-sent">No ViewState is sent</a>.</p>
